Hope Lives! Announces Paint the Town Pink Gala Event

Fort Collins, CO, December 22, 2023: Hope Lives! The Lydia Dody Breast Cancer Support Center is proud to announce our popular and award-winning gala, Paint the Town Pink! This glamorous event is our signature fundraiser and honors over twenty years of providing support, hope, and services to breast cancer patients in northern Colorado.

Join Hope Lives! on Saturday, February 17th, 2024, from 5:30-9:30pm at the Fort Collins Hilton. This elegant and formal evening includes a gourmet dinner, drinks, silent and live auctions, music by Colorado Swing, a touching fashion show featuring current Hope Lives! ambassadors, and much more. Many opportunities exist to support our event, including corporate table and other sponsorships, individual ticket sales, monetary donations, volunteering, donating silent auctions or prizes, or other in-kind donations.

Purchase tickets or request sponsorships at thinkpink.givesmart.com., or visit our website, www.hopelives.org.

Hope Lives! adds quality of life to breast cancer patients in northern Colorado by offering integrative support services and products that help manage the physical, emotional, social, and financial side effects of breast cancer treatment.

For additional information, contact Elise Carver, Executive Director, [email protected].

Unable to attend event, but still want to support the important work Hope Lives! does? Monetary donations are always welcomed and appreciated.

How to donate:

Text HopeLives! to 44321

Venmo @hopelives

www.hopelives.org/support-us
